content.raw:
commit c008c8a

The first time visuals are created, they're added to their child links and stored on the `model.jointVisuals` array.

Hiding removes them from the link, making them invisible.

Showing adds them back to their link, according to the order they were stored. There's a call to `model.getObjectByName` to get the child link here (I guess it is less expensive than `GZ3D.Scene.getByName` because it doesn't go through the whole scene).
content.html:
commit c008c8a

The first time visuals are created, they're added to their child links and stored on the model.jointVisuals array.

Hiding removes them from the link, making them invisible.

Showing adds them back to their link, according to the order they were stored. There's a call to model.getObjectByName to get the child link here (I guess it is less expensive than GZ3D.Scene.getByName because it doesn't go through the whole scene).
